item.title: Boz - BBB
item.description: It"s the Taint of the Weeku2122 again, so it"s time for Boz to utter complete bollocks in between your requests. All aboard the Train-Wreck, WOO WOOH!

item.title: Gurt - Radio Awesome
item.description: I"m not at the gathering because I"m in the stupid hemisphere and out of money! I"m on the radio still though! Join me while I entertain what is probably a far smaller audience as usual!
